Ekadhamma Vagga：1．Ekadhamma Vagga.-The sixteenth chapter of the Eka-nipāta of the Anguttara Nikāya．It contains ten suttas，in which ten subjects of reflection （anussati） are mentioned as being conducive to inner emancipation．A.i.30.

2．Ekadhamma Vagga.-The first chapter of the Anāpānā Samyutta of the Samyutta Nikaya．S.v.311-41.
